```{r}
oddcount <- function(x){
    k <- 0
    for(n in x){
        if(n %% 2 == 1){
            k <- k + 1
        }
    }
    return(k)
}
```

```{r}
oddcount(c(1, 3, 5))
oddcount(c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 10))

z <- c(2, 6, 7)
oddcount(z)
```
